## Exercises

For exercises in this module we'll use documents that you prepared as part of your homework assignment: [Homework 2: About page](../0-3-homework/).

### Publish to Quarto

- open quarto.pub and sign in
- back to Posit Cloud
- Open Terminal
- write: quarto publish
- enter
- yes
- click URL
- Allow and close tav
- Site name: website
- Wait
- Show new file
- Open site
